name: Skuare Island
description: Skuare Island. Welcome to a dreamscape all of your very own! Unfortunately for you, you are rather awful at dreaming up dreamscapes. Your dreamscape just so happens to be a small deserted island in the middle of an endless ocean made out of small colored squares. There is, however, a way out of this. You must catch the elusive Dreamfly floating about the top of the dreamscape! But that's not even the worst of it! Dream pirates have come to ransack your perfect little dream island! It's up to you to fortify your dreamscape in preparation for their arrival, so that they don't tamper your efforts of obtaining the Dreamfly and making your escape!
